original_title: At The Gates - Under a Serpent Sun - The Story of At The Gates
overview: At The Gates - The Flames Of The End - Disc 1 'Under A Serpent Sun - The Story of At the Gates'  Over 2 hours of brand new documentary detailing the band's entire career with exclusive interviews and footage, filmed and directed by guitarist Anders Bjorler.
title: At The Gates - Under a Serpent Sun - The Story of At The Gates
